articles.description: The Cincinnati Bengals capitalise on a late Dallas Cowboys blunder to end their three-game losing streak and win 27-20 in the NFL.

articles.description: BBC Sport visits Girona to find out how the Catalan club went from playing in the lower divisions to becoming part of the City Football Group and reaching the Champions League.
